title: Stop tagging sheep...
content: Bad [Palatino letter spacing](http://web.archive.org/web/20111027215515/http:/www.flightglobal.com/Articles/2006/04/19/Navigation/177/206062/Air+Force+One+graffiti+tagger+admits+to+elaborate+hoax.html) reveals [Air Force 1 tagging video](http://web.archive.org/web/20111027215515/http:/www.stillfree.com/) as a fake.
author: Sii Daniels

comments.content:
Well, if one actually bothers to read the disclaimer on the site, it says that the footage is not of the real Air Force 1...

_"Therefore, and by reason of the foregoing, the producers, creators and distributors of this video hereby verily certify that the foregoing fictionalization and dramatization was not real."_
Apparently the disclaimer was added after the blogosphere spotted that it was fake.

Looking at the nacelles, several correspondents observed that the colour blue (Boeing Pantene BAC 5070) is wrong

Now they use shampoo for spec'ing color.

\> _(Boeing Pantene BAC 5070)_

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111027215515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Pantene2.png)

Is that what the flight attendents are using these days?

Shows you how old I am since this is what I thought when I read the topic title.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111027215515im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tagging-sheep.png)
